author: kfogel
msg: (fold_state_changes): force precedence in modify_existence flag check.

author: cmpilato
msg: (apply_textdelta): Claim that we have a text-mod if apply_textdelta

author: sussman
msg: Bugfixes for 'svn st': (1) anchor-target correctness, (2) make
nonrecursive flag work again.  (Both bugs were caused by my recent
instead of anchor/target.  Do anchor/target analysis internally, so
this editor doesn't accidentally try to store './foo' in the hash
when 'foo' is already there!  Thanks to cmpilato for help with this.
(struct edit_baton):  change anchor/target fields to `path', add
(tweak_statushash): stop taking a revision arg, as per gstein's
suggestion;  change callers.  Also, ignore any path that is a child

author: gstein
msg: (add_update_info_to_status_hash): don't bother storing unused error results
